__e: The witness seemed a little slow to me, Mr. Biegler.
She didn't put the money in the bag fast enough, she reached for the alarm?
You, however, a little slow on the uptake.
- Okay, that means if I boss you around, make you work late, fire you, anything,
- Hey, man, no, man. He went triple plastic 'cause the first song was slow and everybody's...
I had to call his family in Chicago and tell them he was a ticking clock to a slow and terrible death.
I never thought I'd find someone slower than me.
The only thing is, James's car rides lower than this and will be worse.
Look, I'm sorry that I was slower than you, but... I'm here now.
